mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS store_cnt FROM user_tb WHERE store_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT u.store_no, u.store_name, nvl(u.store_img_no, -1) store_img_no, nvl(r.store_rating,0) store_rating, nvl(r.store_review_cnt,0) store_review_cnt, nvl(p.store_product_cnt,0) store_product_cnt FROM user_tb u LEFT JOIN (SELECT store_no, trunc(avg(store_review_rating)) AS store_rating , count(1) AS store_review_cnt FROM store_review_tb GROUP BY store_no) r ON u.store_no = r.store_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_seller, count(1) AS store_product_cnt FROM product_tb GROUP BY product_seller) p ON p.product_seller = u.user_no WHERE store_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
